content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/java-ui-factory is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. I need to:
1. First, explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Check the pom.xml file to see current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17 in pom.xml
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if everything works
6. Fix any issues that arise
7. Continue until `mvn clean verify` succeeds

Let me start by exploring the repository structure.
